description.narrative: FMO is investing through its Capacity Development Program in Caspian's CII fund. The fund envisages having about around 20-25% of its portfolio in the agriculture and allied sectors, a relatively unknown sector for the fund manager. External expertise will therefore be needed. Furthermore, CII being a debt fund with a significant portion of debt anticipated to come from offshore, needs to build their understanding of the foreign exchange (FX) market and the ability to actively manage FX risk internally. This capacity development project will build internal capacity in these two areas by means of external consultants.
